text.section:
Except as provided in subsection (c) of this section, unless a real estate broker license is renewed for a 2-year term as provided in this section, the license expires on the first March 1 that comes:
after the effective date of the license; and
in an even-numbered year.

Except as provided in subsection (c) of this section, unless an associate real estate broker or real estate salesperson license is renewed for a 2-year term as provided in this section, the license expires on the first April 30 that comes:
after the effective date of the license; and
in an even-numbered year.
The Secretary may determine that licenses issued under this title shall expire on a staggered basis.

section.section:
At least 1 month before a license expires, the Commission shall mail to the licensee, as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection:
a renewal application form; and
a notice that states:
If the licensee is a real estate broker, the Commission shall mail the renewal application form and notice to the principal office of the broker.

If the licensee is an associate real estate broker or a real estate salesperson, the Commission shall mail the renewal application form and notice to the principal office of the real estate broker with whom the licensee is affiliated.

text.section: The Commission shall renew the license of and issue a renewal certificate and pocket card to each licensee who meets the requirements of this section.
